info.title: idocs api document
info.description:
Use this API to cancel the payment if the payment result is not returned after a long time. The cancellation cannot be performed if being out of the cancellable period specified in the contract. Use the same paymentId or paymentRequestId that is used in the payment API to cancel the payment transaction.

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header
  • Response header


Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".
info.descriptionLake:
Use this API to cancel the payment if the payment result is not returned after a long time. The cancellation cannot be performed if being out of the cancellable period specified in the contract. Use the same paymentId or paymentRequestId that is used in the payment API to cancel the payment transaction.

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header
  • Response header


Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".

paymentId.description: The original payment ID of the payment request to be canceled, generated by Alipay to uniquely identify the payment when the merchant initiates the original payment. paymentId and paymentRequestId cannot both be null. A one-to-one correspondence between paymentId and paymentRequestId exists.
paymentId.descriptionLake: The original payment ID of the payment request to be canceled, generated by Alipay to uniquely identify the payment when the merchant initiates the original payment. paymentId and paymentRequestId cannot both be null. A one-to-one correspondence between paymentId and paymentRequestId exists.

paymentRequestId.description: The original payment request ID of the payment request to be canceled, generated by the merchant to uniquely identify a payment request. paymentRequestId and paymentId cannot both be null. If both paymentRequestId and paymentId are provided, paymentId takes precedence.
paymentRequestId.descriptionLake: The original payment request ID of the payment request to be canceled, generated by the merchant to uniquely identify a payment request. paymentRequestId and paymentId cannot both be null. If both paymentRequestId and paymentId are provided, paymentId takes precedence.

merchantAccountId.description:
The unique ID to identify a merchant account.

Specify this parameter when you use a single client ID across multiple locations.
merchantAccountId.descriptionLake:
The unique ID to identify a merchant account.

Specify this parameter when you use a single client ID across multiple locations.

resultCode.description: Result code. Possible values are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.
resultCode.descriptionLake: Result code. Possible values are listed in the Result/Error codes table on this page.

resultStatus.description:
Result status. Valid values are:  

  • S: Indicates that the payment is canceled successfully.
  • F: Indicates that the payment failed to be canceled.
  • U: Indicates that the cancellation result is unknown.
resultStatus.descriptionLake:
Result status. Valid values are:  

  • S: Indicates that the payment is canceled successfully.
  • F: Indicates that the payment failed to be canceled.
  • U: Indicates that the cancellation result is unknown.

resultMessage.description: Result message that explains the result code.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: Result message that explains the result code.

result.description: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the payment is canceled successfully.
result.descriptionLake: Indicates whether this API is called successfully. If this API is successfully called, the payment is canceled successfully.

paymentId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a payment.

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).
paymentId.descriptionLake:
The unique ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a payment.

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

paymentRequestId.description:
The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a payment request. 

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).
paymentRequestId.descriptionLake:
The unique ID that is assigned by a merchant to identify a payment request. 

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

cancelTime.description:
The actual execution completion time of the payment cancellation process, which is the date and time when the payment cancellation succeeds.

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).
cancelTime.descriptionLake:
The actual execution completion time of the payment cancellation process, which is the date and time when the payment cancellation succeeds.

Note: This field is returned when the cancellation succeeds (the value of result.resultStatus is S).

result.resultMessage: The cancellation date exceeds the period during which cancellation is supported. The period is agreed upon in the contract.

x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support to resolve the issue.

x-result.message: The cancellation date exceeds the period during which cancellation is supported. The period is agreed upon in the contract.
The private key or public key of Alipay or the merchant is not found.

x-result.actionLake: Check whether the private key or public key exists. If not, upload the private key in Alipay Developer Center.

x-result.action: Call the interface again after the merchant has sufficient balance.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again after the merchant has sufficient balance.

x-result.actionLake: Check whether the URL is correct. Please refer to the endpoint in the API documentation.

x-result.actionLake: Check whether paymentId is correct. If correct, contact Alipay Technical Support for specific reasons.

x-result.actionLake: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.

x-result.actionLake: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.actionLake: Do not retry, and contact Alipay Technical Support for more details.

x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If not resolved, contact Alipay Technical Support.

x-result.message: The payment method does not support canceling or refunding transactions if the payment status is successful.

post.x-more:
Result process logic

For different request results, different actions are to be performed. See the following list for details:

  • If the value of result.resultStatus is S, the cancellation succeeded.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is F, the cancellation failed. See the returned error code and determine further actions.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is U, the cancellation result is unknown. Use the same request parameters to retry the cancellation request.
  • If no response is returned, use the same request parameters to retry the cancellation request.

For different request results, different actions are to be performed. See the following list for details:

  • If the value of result.resultStatus is S, the cancellation succeeded.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is F, the cancellation failed. See the returned error code and determine further actions.
  • If the value of result.resultStatus is U, the cancellation result is unknown. Use the same request parameters to retry the cancellation request.
  • If no response is returned, use the same request parameters to retry the cancellation request.
